account_id.description: The account associated with the loan

product_id.description: the Product ID of the loan (to determine which policies to apply to the loan).

original_loan_amount_cents.description: For installment loans, the originating loan amount for the first loan created for the account.

rate.description: The percentage rate applied to this line item (i.e. 15.5 means 15.5%). If it was not set at the time of loan creation, its default value is the default rate of the account.

offer_id.description: For installment loans, the offer_id of the offer applied to the first loan created for the account. This field is not necessary for credit products. If left blank, the default offer will be applied.

effective_at.description: The `Date-Time` that this line item became/becomes active

created_at.description: The `Date-Time` which the line item was created in the API

description.description: A description of this particular loan if any.
description.example: Loan taken out to fund automobile purchase.

reference_id.description: User ID in your system to associate with the payment for the account defined in Canopy.

external_ids.description: An array of static references to ID fields in a third party system.

schema.description: An individual installment loan for an account holder at Canopy.
